00001 ######################################################################
00002 # Name:    embed_tke.tcl
00003 # Author:  Trevor Williams  (phase1geo@gmail.com)
00004 # Date:    06/05/2014
00005 # Brief:   Package that provides an embeddable TKE editor to be used

00009 package provide embed_tke 1.0
00010 
00011 set tke_dir   [file normalize [embed_tke::DIR]]
00012 set tke_home  [file normalize [file join ~ .tke]]
00013 
00014 set auto_path [concat [file join $tke_dir lib] $auto_path]
00015 
00016 package require -exact ctext 4.0
00017 package require tooltip
00018 
00019 source [file join $tke_dir lib bgproc.tcl]

00021 namespace eval embed_tke {
00022   
00023   source [file join [DIR] lib preferences.tcl]
00024   source [file join [DIR] lib tkedat.tcl]
00025   source [file join [DIR] lib gui.tcl] 
00026   source [file join [DIR] lib vim.tcl]

00034   # Handle launcher requests
00035   namespace eval launcher {
00036     proc register {args} {}
00037     proc unregister {args} {}
00038   }
00039   
00040   namespace eval gui {
00041     rename set_current_tab set_current_tab__orig
00042     rename set_current_tab_from_txt set_current_tab_from_txt__orig
00043     rename update_position update_position__orig
00044     rename save_current save_current__orig
00045     rename close_current close_current__orig
00046     
00047     proc set_current_tab {args} {}
00048     proc set_current_tab_from_txt {args} {}
00049     proc update_position {args} {}
00050     proc save_current {args} { puts "Saving" }
00051     proc close_current {args} { puts "Closing" }
00052   }

00054   array set data   {}
00055   array set images {}
00056

00058     -language {language Language}

00061   ######################################################################
00062   # Creates an embeddable TKE widget and returns the pathname to the widget
00063   proc embed_tke {w args} {
00064     
00065     variable data
00066     variable images
00067     variable widget_options
00068     
00069     # If this is the first time we have been called, do some initialization
00070     if {[array size images] == 0} {
00071 
00072       # Initialize default options
00073       option add *EmbedTke.language      "None" widgetDefault
00074             
00075       # Create images
00076       set imgdir [file join $::tke_dir lib images]
00077       set images(split) \
00078         [image create bitmap -file     [file join $imgdir split.bmp] \
00079                              -maskfile [file join $imgdir split.bmp] \
00080                              -foreground grey10]
00081       set images(close) \
00082         [image create bitmap -file     [file join $imgdir close.bmp] \
00083                              -maskfile [file join $imgdir close.bmp] \
00084                              -foreground grey10]
00085       set images(global) \
00086         [image create photo  -file     [file join $imgdir global.gif]]
00087         
00088       # Load the preferences
00089       preferences::load
00090 
00091       # Load the snippets
00092       snippets::load
00093 
00094       # Load the syntax highlighting information
00095       syntax::load
00096       
00097     }
00098     
00099     # Create widget
00100     ttk::frame $w
00101     ctext $w.txt -wrap none -undo 1 -autoseparators 1 -insertofftime 0 \
00102       -highlightcolor yellow \
00103       -linemap_mark_command gui::mark_command -linemap_select_bg orange
00104     #-warnwidth $preferences::prefs(Editor/WarningWidth)
00105     ttk::label     $w.split -image $images(split) -anchor center
00106     ttk::scrollbar $w.vb    -orient vertical   -command "$w.txt yview"
00107     ttk::scrollbar $w.hb    -orient horizontal -command "$w.txt xview"
00108     
00109     bind Ctext    <<Modified>>          "[namespace current]::gui::text_changed %W"
00110     bind $w.txt.t <FocusIn>             "[namespace current]::gui::set_current_tab_from_txt %W"
00111     bind $w.txt.l <ButtonPress-3>       [bind $w.txt.l <ButtonPress-1>]
00112     bind $w.txt.l <ButtonPress-1>       "[namespace current]::gui::select_line %W %y"
00113     bind $w.txt.l <B1-Motion>           "[namespace current]::gui::select_lines %W %y"
00114     bind $w.txt.l <Shift-ButtonPress-1> "[namespace current]::gui::select_lines %W %y"
00115     bind $w.txt   <<Selection>>         "[namespace current]::gui::selection_changed %W"
00116     bind $w.txt   <ButtonPress-1>       "after idle [list [namespace current]::gui::update_position %W]"
00117     bind $w.txt   <B1-Motion>           "[namespace current]::gui::update_position %W"
00118     bind $w.txt   <KeyRelease>          "[namespace current]::gui::update_position %W"
00119     bind $w.split <Button-1>            "[namespace current]::gui::toggle_split_pane $w.txt"
00120     bind Text     <<Cut>>               ""
00121     bind Text     <<Copy>>              ""
00122     bind Text     <<Paste>>             ""
00123     bind Text     <Control-d>           ""
00124     bind Text     <Control-i>           ""
00125     
00126     # Move the all bindtag ahead of the Text bindtag
00127     set text_index [lsearch [bindtags $w.txt.t] Text]
00128     set all_index  [lsearch [bindtags $w.txt.t] all]
00129     bindtags $w.txt.t [lreplace [bindtags $w.txt.t] $all_index $all_index]
00130     bindtags $w.txt.t [linsert  [bindtags $w.txt.t] $text_index all]
00131     
00132     # Create the Vim command bar
00133     vim::bind_command_entry $w.txt \
00134       [entry $w.ve -background black -foreground white -insertbackground white \
00135         -font [$w.txt cget -font]] $w.txt
00136     
00137     # Create the search bar
00138     ttk::frame $w.sf
00139     ttk::label $w.sf.l1    -text [msgcat::mc "Find:"]
00140     ttk::entry $w.sf.e
00141     ttk::label $w.sf.case  -text "Aa" -relief raised
00142     ttk::label $w.sf.close -image $images(close)
00143     
00144     tooltip::tooltip $w.sf.case "Case sensitivity"
00145     
00146     pack $w.sf.l1    -side left  -padx 2 -pady 2
00147     pack $w.sf.e     -side left  -padx 2 -pady 2 -fill x -expand yes
00148     pack $w.sf.close -side right -padx 2 -pady 2
00149     pack $w.sf.case  -side right -padx 2 -pady 2
00150     
00151     bind $w.sf.e     <Escape>    "[namespace current]::gui::close_search"
00152     bind $w.sf.case  <Button-1>  "[namespace current]::gui::toggle_labelbutton %W"
00153     bind $w.sf.case  <Key-space> "[namespace current]::gui::toggle_labelbutton %W"
00154     bind $w.sf.case  <Escape>    "[namespace current]::gui::close_search"
00155     bind $w.sf.close <Button-1>  "[namespace current]::gui::close_search"
00156     bind $w.sf.close <Key-space> "[namespace current]::gui::close_search"
00157  
00158     # Create the search/replace bar
00159     ttk::frame $w.rf
00160     ttk::label $w.rf.fl    -text [msgcat::mc "Find:"]
00161     ttk::entry $w.rf.fe
00162     ttk::label $w.rf.rl    -text [msgcat::mc "Replace:"]
00163     ttk::entry $w.rf.re
00164     ttk::label $w.rf.case  -text "Aa" -relief raised
00165     ttk::label $w.rf.glob  -image $images(global) -relief raised
00166     ttk::label $w.rf.close -image $images(close)
00167     
00168     tooltip::tooltip $w.rf.case "Case sensitivity"
00169     tooltip::tooltip $w.rf.glob "Replace globally"
00170  
00171     pack $w.rf.fl    -side left -padx 2 -pady 2
00172     pack $w.rf.fe    -side left -padx 2 -pady 2 -fill x -expand yes
00173     pack $w.rf.rl    -side left -padx 2 -pady 2
00174     pack $w.rf.re    -side left -padx 2 -pady 2 -fill x -expand yes
00175     pack $w.rf.case  -side left -padx 2 -pady 2
00176     pack $w.rf.glob  -side left -padx 2 -pady 2
00177     pack $w.rf.close -side left -padx 2 -pady 2
00178  
00179     bind $w.rf.fe    <Return>    "[namespace current]::gui::do_search_and_replace $w.txt"
00180     bind $w.rf.re    <Return>    "[namespace current]::gui::do_search_and_replace $w.txt"
00181     bind $w.rf.glob  <Return>    "[namespace current]::gui::do_search_and_replace $w.txt"
00182     bind $w.rf.fe    <Escape>    "[namespace current]::gui::close_search_and_replace"
00183     bind $w.rf.re    <Escape>    "[namespace current]::gui::close_search_and_replace"
00184     bind $w.rf.case  <Button-1>  "[namespace current]::gui::toggle_labelbutton %W"
00185     bind $w.rf.case  <Key-space> "[namespace current]::gui::toggle_labelbutton %W"
00186     bind $w.rf.case  <Escape>    "[namespace current]::gui::close_search_and_replace"
00187     bind $w.rf.glob  <Button-1>  "[namespace current]::gui::toggle_labelbutton %W"
00188     bind $w.rf.glob  <Key-space> "[namespace current]::gui::toggle_labelbutton %W"
00189     bind $w.rf.glob  <Escape>    "[namespace current]::gui::close_search_and_replace"
00190     bind $w.rf.close <Button-1>  "[namespace current]::gui::close_search_and_replace"
00191     bind $w.rf.close <Key-space> "[namespace current]::gui::close_search_and_replace"
00192     
00193     # FOOBAR
00194     grid rowconfigure    $w 1 -weight 1
00195     grid columnconfigure $w 0 -weight 1
00196     grid $w.txt   -row 0 -column 0 -sticky news -rowspan 2
00197     grid $w.split -row 0 -column 1 -sticky news
00198     grid $w.vb    -row 1 -column 1 -sticky ns
00199     grid $w.hb    -row 2 -column 0 -sticky ew
00200     grid $w.ve    -row 3 -column 0 -sticky ew
00201     grid $w.sf    -row 4 -column 0 -sticky ew
00202     grid $w.rf    -row 5 -column 0 -sticky ew
00203     
00204     # Hide the vim command entry, search bar, search/replace bar and search separator
00205     grid remove $w.ve
00206     grid remove $w.sf
00207     grid remove $w.rf
00208     
00209     # Add the text bindings
00210     indent::add_bindings      $w.txt
00211     multicursor::add_bindings $w.txt
00212     snippets::add_bindings    $w.txt
00213     vim::set_vim_mode         $w.txt $w.txt
00214         
00215     # Apply the appropriate syntax highlighting for the given extension
00216     syntax::initialize_language $w.txt "<None>"
00217 
00218     # Set the current language
00219     syntax::set_current_language $w.txt
00220 
00221     # Initialize the options array
00222     foreach opt [array names widget_options] {
00223       set data($w,option,$opt) [option get $w [lindex $widget_options($opt) 0] [lindex $widget_options($opt) 1]]
00224     }
00225     
00226     # Configure the widget
00227     configure 1 $w {*}$args
00228     
00229     # Rename and alias the embed_tke window
00230     rename ::$w $w
00231     interp alias {} ::$w {} embed_tke::widget_cmd $w
00232     
00233     return $w
00234     
00235   }
00236   
00237   ######################################################################
00238   # Calls the various widget commands.
00239   proc widget_cmd {w args} {
00240   
00241     if {[llength $args] == 0} {
00242       return -code error "embed_tke widget called without a command"
00243     }
00244     
00245     set cmd  [lindex $args 0]
00246     set opts [lrange $args 1 end]
00247   
00248     switch $cmd {
00249       cget      { return [embed_tke::cget $w {*}$opts] }
00250       configure { return [embed_tke::configure 0 $w {*}$opts] }
00251       default   { return -code error "Unknown embed_tke command ($cmd)" }
00252     }
00253     
00254   }
00255   
00256   ######################################################################
00257   # configure command.
00258   proc configure {initialize w args} {
00259   
00260     variable data
00261     variable widget_options
00262     
00263     if {([llength $args] == 0) && !$initialize} {
00264     
00265       set results [list]
00266 
00267       foreach opt [lsort [array names widget_options]] {
00268         if {[llength $widget_options($opt)] == 2} {
00269           set opt_name    [lindex $widget_options($opt) 0]
00270           set opt_class   [lindex $widget_options($opt) 1]
00271           set opt_default [option get $w $opt_name $opt_class]
00272           if {[info exists data($w,option,$opt)]} {
00273             lappend results [list $opt $opt_name $opt_class $opt_default $data($w,option,$opt)]
00274           } else {
00275             lappend results [list $opt $opt_name $opt_class $opt_default ""]
00276           }
00277         }
00278       }
00279 
00280       return $results
00281     
00282     } elseif {([llength $args] == 1) && !$initialize} {
00283     
00284       set opt [lindex $args 0]
00285 
00286       if {[info exists widget_options($opt)]} {
00287         if {[llength $widget_options($opt)] == 1} {
00288           set opt [lindex $widget_options($opt) 0]
00289         }
00290         set opt_name    [lindex $widget_options($opt) 0]
00291         set opt_class   [lindex $widget_options($opt) 1]
00292         set opt_default [option get $w $opt_name $opt_class]
00293         if {[info exists data($w,option,$opt)]} {
00294           return [list $opt $opt_name $opt_class $opt_default $data($w,option,$opt)]
00295         } else {
00296           return [list $opt $opt_name $opt_class $opt_default ""]
00297         }
00298       }
00299 
00300       return -code error "tabbar::configuration option [lindex $args 0] does not exist"
00301       
00302     } else {
00303     
00304       # Save the original contents
00305       array set orig_options [array get data $w,option,*]
00306       
00307       # Parse the arguments
00308       foreach {name value} $args {
00309         if {[info exists data($w,option,$name)]} {
00310           set data($w,option,$name) $value
00311         } else {
00312           return -code error "Illegal option given to the embed_tke::configure command ($name)"
00313         }
00314       }
00315       
00316       # Set the language
00317       if {$orig_options($w,option,-language) ne $data($w,option,-language)} {
00318         if {[lsearch [syntax::get_languages] $data($w,option,-language)] != -1} {
00319           syntax::set_language $data($w,option,-language) $w.txt
00320         } else {
00321           return -code error "Unknown language ($data($w,option,-language) specified in embed_tke::configure command"
00322         }
00323       }
00324     
00325     }
00326   
00327   }
00328   
00329   ######################################################################
00330   # cget command.
00331   proc cget {w args} {
00332 
00333     variable data
00334 
00335     # Verify the argument list is valid
00336     if {[llength $args] != 1} {
00337       return -code error "Incorrect number of parameters given to the embed_tke::cget command"
00338     }
00339 
00340     if {[info exists data($w,option,[lindex $args 0])]} {
00341       return $data($w,option,[lindex $args 0])
00342     } else {
00343       return -code error "Illegal options given to the embed_tke::cget command ([lindex $args 0])"
00344     }
00345   
00346   }
00347   
00348 }
